Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.auth

Class DigestUtils

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.auth.DigestUtils
class DigestUtils extends Object
Digest-MD5 utils.

Provides utility methods for processing authentication data.
